name: Unknown Narrator
description:
Here is our game, hope you like it!

Controls

  • AD or left and right arrows to move.
  • press z to go faster
  • press r to restart
  • Space to jump
  • Click the dialog to skip ahead (or close the dialog).
  • Click the dialog arrows to go forward and back.

The web version may be buggy. For best results, download the Windows or Mac version    

recommended to play on fullscreen for the web version
